item.title: using git send-email for sending kernel patches
item.description: Sending patches to a Linux kernel mailing list can be done easily using git-send-email. This post will help setup your environment and show you how to format the git send-email command. In addition there are some more advanced features that help when you need to send from multiple accounts. Git Setup First, install git and git-email. Then, setup ~/.gitconfig for your user and proper sendemail section. This shows a sendemail setup for a typical single gmail account.
